pronunciation.pinyin: qiǎng niǔ de guā bù tián
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: qiang3 niu3 de5 gua1 bu4 tian2

meanings.value: if you have to use force to break a melon off the vine, it won't taste sweet (because it's only when the melon is ripe that it can be removed with just a slight twist)
fig. if sth is not meant to be, it's no use trying to force it to happen
